figure_1: The participant flowchart outlining the inclusion or exclusion of participants and the path to the final sample size. Abbreviations: BMI, body mass index; EMA, ecological momentary assessment.
figure_2: Diurnal patterns of (A) subjective stress, (B) occurrence of sexual desire, and (C) occurrence of sexual arousal. Higher values indicate higher probability of occurrence or higher levels of the construct. The error bars show the standard error of the mean.
